article:
Dorothy Brown was very happy as she sat in the theatre listening to the music. Today her little daughter Lauren was giving her   . first  concert. She had been waiting for this  _  for years and years."Now
it is here at last,"  she thought."How beautiful her  _  is!"
The song made her   go back   to the days when she was Lauren's   _  .As a young   girl  ,Dorothy wanted to be a concert singer. She
studied  _  in France, Italy and in the United States."You can
become a fine  _  in the future," her teachers told her."But you
must be   _   to study hard and work for many years. There will be  _  time for anything but music in your life."
